creator: Halmi.sk - apps for better life 💗
descriptionHtml:
Need geometry calculator?


Geometry solver is certified by teachers and awarded by professionals.


We are Educational App Store certified app and we won #11 place in Math category in Mobile Learning in Action!

Kids have a math class and parents have to check their homework. Well, most parents no longer have any idea about theorems and formulas they learned in school. No matter if you're a parent or a kid, now you have a geometric helper at your disposal!

Geometry also has many practical uses in everyday life and civil engineering, such as measuring circumference, area and volume, when you need to build or create something. For example, you must calculate the perimeter of your yard to determine how much fencing you need or calculate the surface area of your walls to determine how much paint you need.

Solve the perimeter, area, surface or volume of various geometric shapes with this geometry calculator.


Simple and easy to use homework helper that proofs your solutions! You better download this geometry solver app!

Perimeter and surface area calculator for 2D shapes:
- square,
- rectangle,
- circle,
- ellipse,
- triangle,
- trapezoid,
- parallelogram,
- trigonometry,
- equilateral triangle,
- isosceles triangle,
- right triangle,
- circular segment,
- circular sector,
- annular sector,
- elliptical segment,
- annulus,
- quadratic function,
- cubic function.

Area and volume calculator for 3D shapes:
- cone,
- truncated cone,
- pyramid,
- sphere,
- cube,
- cylinder,
- torus,
- right triangular prism,
- rectangular prism,
- truncated pyramid,
- barrel,
- asymmetric barrel,
- trapezoidal prism,
- paralellogram prism,
- wedge,
- elliptic cone,
- tetrahedron,
- octahedron,
- dodecahedron,
- icosahedron,
- oblique cylinder,
- oblique prism,
- oblique cone,
- oblique truncated cone,
- truncated elliptical cone
- triangular prism,
- frustum,
- right prism,
- spherical sector,
- spherical cap,
- spherical segment,
- spherical wedge,
- ellipsoid,
- toroid.

Questions? Send an email: geometry.calculator@halmi.sk
Mobile Learning in action: https://bestonlineuniversities.com/favorite-mobile-learning-apps/
descriptionShort: Perimeter, volume and surface area geometry calculator for shapes. Free with ADs

title: Geometry solver ² lite - homework math calculator

creator: Halmi.sk - apps for better life 💗
descriptionHtml:
Need a geometry calculator?


Geometry solver is certified by teachers and awarded by professionals.


We are Educational App Store certified app and we won #11 place in Math category in Mobile Learning in Action!

Kids have a math class and parents have to check their homework. Well, most parents no longer have any idea about formulas they learned in school. No matter if you're a parent or a kid, now you have a geometric helper at your disposal!

This app will help you in everyday life and civil engineering calculations, such as measuring circumference, area and volume, when you need to build or create something. For example, you must calculate the perimeter of your yard to determine how much fencing you need or calculate the surface area of your walls to determine how much paint you need.

Solve the perimeter, area, surface or volume of various geometric shapes with this geometry calculator.


Simple and easy to use homework helper that proofs your solutions! You better download this geometry solver app!

Compute perimeter and surface area of 2D shapes like square, circle, find angles in triangle, rectangle, but also some advanced ones like trapezoid, parallelogram, rhombus or incircle and circumcircle of a triangle with this geometry calculator! Contains 20 different 2D forms with formulas and calculations.

Calculate surface area and volume for 3D shapes such as pyramid, sphere, any prism, barrel, -hedrons and others. You can also use it to evaluate oblique and truncated shapes properties. There are 35 various 3D forms.

Questions about the geometry solver? Send an email: rootko@gmail.com
Mobile Learning in action: https://bestonlineuniversities.com/favorite-mobile-learning-apps/
